amendment.description: To include water and wastewater treatment facilities among energy-intensive industries and to expand the role of the institution of higher education-based industrial research and assessment centers.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2984 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2984 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Baldwin to Amendment SA 2953.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2984 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2984 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Baldwin to Amendment SA 2953.
